title: See adorable puppies run around the Georgia Aquarium
description: Adoptable puppies from the Atlanta Humane Society explore the Georgia Aquarium as it remains closed to the public due to the coronavirus pandemic.
content: Chat with us in Facebook Messenger. Find out what's happening in the world as it unfolds.

author: Faith Karimi, CNN
title: Three inmates test positive in Georgia as concerns grow over prison system
description: Three inmates have tested positive for the coronavirus in Georgia, raising concerns the pandemic could spread within tight prison quarters nationwide.
content:

author: Nicole Chavez, Angela Barajas and Dianne Gallagher, CNN
title: When a retired janitor died, crowds flocked to his funeral and mourned together. Within weeks, their city was overrun by coronavirus cases
description: Albany, Georgia is no longer a coronavirus outlier. Instead, it serves as an example of how the virus can impact smaller, sprawling rural areas as much as it can larger cities.
content:
Albany, Georgia (CNN)When a retired janitor suddenly died in southern Georgia, crowds of relatives and friends flocked to a local funeral home and mourned together. Within weeks, their city was overrun by coronavirus cases.

title: Coronavirus: The Masters cancelled due to ongoing health crisis
description: The Masters, the first major championship of the year in men's golf, is postponed due to coronavirus.
content:
The Masters has been postponed because of the coronavirus crisis.
The first men's major championship of the year was due to begin on 9 April at Augusta National in Georgia.
More to follow.
